poem:
Corrections, Clarifications

Ink on newsprint,
errors like spilled water,
misnamed lives swimming
in the deep end of pages.
Ofsted, Ofwat, Ron,
Rob—all letters shifting 
in the current,
a daily dive
into the waters
of our human,
so human frailty.
